# Abandoned Building Boss Automatically removes all abandoned buildings and their connected sub-entities such as lanes, areas, and networks. This keeps city saves stable, prevents simulation clutter, and reduces performance loss caused by leftover abandoned structures.
## Features * Safe, lightweight, and runs automatically. * No Harmony or Reflection for most compatibility - less likely to break with game updates. * Toggle on/off from the mod's Settings → Actions tab. * Safe to remove at any time.
## Support * Feedback/suggestions at Cities: Skylines Modding Discord (https://discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2)
## If you find this mod useful, don't forget to give it a like.
